title: Agama rAjagOpAla akhilANDa
sahitya:
Agama rAjagOpAla akhilANDa paripAla Ananda lIla


anupallavi

  yOgIndra hrt-ayana bhOginuta caraNA nAgEndra phaNI shayanA gOvardhanOddharaNA


caraNam    majjana mAvaka krSNA manmatha manmatha krSNA nanda nandana krSNA 
gajjaLa rUSita shashi kaLanka iva mukha krSNA kALinga phaNa naTana krSNA krSNa krSNA
